entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High 16. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 7 May 2023
